title: League won't launch 2016
body: When I open League it only shows the part of it in top left hand corner and it's REALLY small there is no exit or minimize button in the top right anymore, I spend hundreds of dollars on this game and i can't open it now please help.........

replies.body: I'm having trouble understanding what's happening.  Do you have a screenshot handy of what you're seeing exactly?  Where is it happening, after you log in?  Let me know, and I'll try to help!

It just looks funny but I got it to work for THAT issue. But now when I click on the game to open it I'll run it as administrator, and the LoL logo will pop up and it will load for a second then nothing.... When it'll normally pop up to the launcher... Nothing will happen I have no idea what's going on but I guess I can't play the game until the problem is fixed.... Maybe it's a preseason bug? Or is it my desktop?
